text: [[img:emp_hostility]][[/img]]Hostility reflects the current level of enemy aggression due to the Ravenqueen Hosts military actions. [[img:emp_imperial_supply]][[/img]]Clan Reinforcements are sent from Albion to bolster your forces with various reinforcement types. The higher the [[img:emp_hostility]][[/img]]Hostility level, the more frequently [[img:emp_imperial_supply]][[/img]]Clan Reinforcements are dispatched from the Albion mainland.

[[img:bullet_emp_mandate]][[/img]]Belief is a measure of how much faith lies in the Ravenqueen Hosts progress towards destroying Chaos. Expansion and building or upgrading Waystones will increase [[img:bullet_emp_mandate]][[/img]]Belief and lead to better-quality reinforcements dispatched from Albion via the [[img:emp_imperial_supply]][[/img]]Clan Reinforcement system.
